description:
虽说自2013年，四级考试取消了完形填空的选项，一定程度上降低了词组的登场率，然而，这也改变不了词组们的存在感。因为无论在阅读中，还是写作中，词组依旧占据着一席之地，可以为你的分数增色不少呢！

1. be on ...

be on show / display / play / sale / strike / duty / trial

2. be of ...

be of value / importance / use / no use / color / age / size / height / weight / significance 

3. to one's ...

to one’s joy / surprise / pleasure / astonishment / sorrow / delight 

4. in ...

in surprise / wonder / alarm / terror / horror / delight 

in fact / reality / substance / nature / practice / theory / short / brief / a word / detail / all / average / full / time / fashion / existence / turn / vain / haste / appearance / common / sum/ general / particular / public / secret / order / part / power / stock / case / bed / future / name / addition / sight 

5. by ...

by air / bicycle / boat / bus / car / letter / post / plane / telephone / train / wire 

6. at ...

at daybreak / sunrise / dawn / noon / dark / night 

7. out of ...

out of breath / control / question / sight 

8. on ...

on duty / shift / holiday / leave / business / purpose / time / sale / show / board / hand / record / request / root / earth / farm / principle 

9. for ...

for example / instance / all / good / nothing / convenience / short / fear / sale 

10. by ...

by weight ( volume size number~~ ) / profession / definition / rule / turn / chance/ accident/ mistake / hand / train ( bus ,taxi ,ship ,boat ~~) / air / land / force / day / nature / sight 

11. at ...

at most / least / best / worst / once / first / last / home / school / will ( at will:任意) / work /
night / midnight / daybreak / dawn / present / length / large 

12. as ...

as above / below / following / over / usual / before / a matter of fact 

13. above ...

above all / measure / normal 

14. before ...

before all / long / time / now / then 

15. after ...

after all / class / school 

16. out of ...

out of action / order / condition / use / operation / step / joint / repair/ gear / balance / range/
doubt / date / danger / hand / shape / place / question / stock / 

17. with ...

with caution / interest / difficulty / ease / advantage / effect / reason / vigor / reserve / success / confidence 

18. beyond ...

beyond comprehension / conception / description / expression / doubt / control / reach / power / measure / grasp / compare / controversy / dispute / hope / example 

19. under ...

under age / discussion / test / way / repair

四级词汇：高频词组大集合之"get"

四级词汇：高频词组大集合之"give"

四级词汇：高频词组大集合之"look"

四级词汇：高频词组大集合之"make"

四级词汇：高频词组大集合之"take"
